00027 inline double ExponentialCF::correlation(double sqDist) const
00028 {
00029         return exp( - 0.5 * sqrt(sqDist) / lengthScale );
00030 }
00031 
00040 double ExponentialCF::correlationGradient(int p, double sqDist) const
00041 {
00042         assert(p>=0 && p<numberParameters);
00043 
00044         switch (p) {
00045         // Gradient of correlation function with respect to length scale
00046         case 0:
00047                 return 0.5 * sqrt(sqDist) * correlation(sqDist) / sqr(lengthScale);
00048 
00049         // Gradient of correlation function with respect to process variance
00050         case 1:
00051                 return 0.0;
00052         }
00053 }
